page.title: 14Old Basing Stories
page.content: Some older inhabitants related these stories to us. { Soldiers}are said to be heard fighting in{Basing House ruins,}along with the{ghost}of{Oliver Cromwell}who has also been seen digging for the {Basing Treasure.}All the valuables of the soldiers at Basing House are said to have been{melted down}and shaped into a calf. A{ghost}of a girl with a{skipping {rope}has been seen at Garrison Gate by two sets of people out walking at night.Also a{ghost horse}has been heard by an old lady who heard its galloping hooves. A young women in a white nightdress roaming around the Basing ruins has also been seen by a few of the villagers.
